Returns: This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to builder methods.
Parameters: int: The value of @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#WatchNextPrograms#COLUMN_WATCH_NEXT_TYPE_E@ for the program.
setWatchNextType(int).Description: Sets the "watch next" type of this program content. The value should match one of the followings: @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#WatchNextPrograms#WATCH_NEXT_TYPE_CONTINUE_E@, @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#WatchNextPrograms#WATCH_NEXT_TYPE_NEXT_E@, and @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#WatchNextPrograms#WATCH_NEXT_TYPE_NEW_E@.

Returns: This Builder object to allow for chaining of calls to builder methods.
Parameters: long: The value of @B_android#support#media#tv#TvContractCompat#WatchNextPrograms#COLUMN_LAST_ENGAGEMENT_TIME_UTC_MILLIS_E@ for the program.
setLastEngagementTimeUtcMillis(long).Description: Sets the time when the program is going to begin in milliseconds since the epoch.

Returns: A new Program with values supplied by the Builder.

ClassDesc: This Builder class simplifies the creation of a @B_android#support#media#tv#WatchNextProgram_E@ object.
